name: Arrows In A Row
description:
This is the game that finds the longest route.

There are two games, Game A and Game B.

(Game A)
When you start the game, a lot of the panel that the arrow is drawn will appear on the screen.

You can move in the direction of the arrow drawn on the panel when you tap their panel.

By moving a panel, it is a failure If you have got lost destination of the other panel.

When more than one panel has become one, the round is complete.

(Game B)
Within the time limit, tap the arrow panel that will be the longest path.

The bottom of the screen, you can see the longest of the number of connections the current round.
